Tadhhīb al-tahdhīb
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Banbānī, Muḥammad Yaʻqūb Abū Yūsuf , -1686 or 1687
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black ink with words and sentences underlined in red.
According to the colophon, copy completed in the hand of Muḥammad Murād on 9 Jumādá al-Ākhirah 1144 AH [December 9, 1731 AD].
Note on fly leaf dated 27 Ramaḍān 1207 AH [May 8, 1793 AD] and seal by Muḥammad Murād, the copyist, on f. 1r and 1v dated 1132 AH [1719 or 20 AD].
MS Arab SM4164. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
